PSX Greatest Hits Titles, Complete List
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): CD List (North American Version ONLY): PSX Greatest Hits Titles, Complete List
By Lisa Shock on Sunday, February 11, 2001 - 10:45 am:

Here's a current list of all the Greatest Hits re-releases available on PSX. Please note: many of these games have added features, changing the CD data. They often do not make the same monster as the original release. If you post a PSX game please note if it is a Greatest Hits title.
